function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of private space in homes during pandemic","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the importance of room ventilation in reducing covid-19 risk","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Excluded areas may have different socioeconomic variables, potentially biasing the results.","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of individual-level socioeconomic data limited detailed study of mechanisms at work.","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between social inequalities and differential exposure to the virus, susceptibility to infection, comorbidities, and access to care.","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential sars-cov-2 incidence, positivity rates, and testing rates in socially deprived areas compared to mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between feeling of safety and feeling of comfort with willingness to use public transport after the epidemic","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Factors affecting comfort and safety in public transport during the pandemic, including fear of other passengers not following hygienic measures and tidiness of the vehicle.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Switch from stationary work and learning to e-learning and online work","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk-taking attitudes affecting human mobility and social confinement may lead to increased disease Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased commuting and increased isolation for high-density populations and older subpopulations","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in water demand and citizen behavior due to pandemic","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on urban Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social inequalities leading to higher vulnerability to infectious diseases","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical lack of adoption of infection-fighting solutions","category":"Disinformation and Misinformation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on behavioral ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in urban design towards decentralized and restructuring of public spaces due to covid-19 concerns.","category":"Access to infrastructure
